      • Public Sub AddStylesFromDefinition(rngStyleDef As Range)

        Public Sub AddStylesFromDefinition(rngStyleDef As Range)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : AddStylesFromDefinition
        ' Author : Siddhant Chothe
        ' Date : 3/24/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure creates styles from the style definition table.
        ' It creates styles with name from "STYLE" column.
        ' And that has format and protection applied from "FORMAT" and "PROTECTION" column.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Style definition table range--The range of the entire style definition table.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Sub FormatAllBWTables(rngColTable As Range, rngColFormat As Range)

        Private Sub FormatAllBWTables(rngColTable As Range, rngColFormat As Range)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : FormatAllBWTables
        ' Author : Sanghapal Bhowate and updated by Siddhant Chothe
        ' Date : 6/21/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure formats all boardwalk tables as per the associated rule tables or sample ranges.
        ' The association must be provided via 2 column ranges.
        ' First column must list out the boardwalk tables to format.
        ' The second one must have either
        ' "BoardwalkTable:"
        ' or "Range:"
        ' Where stands for format criteria cuboid.
        ' And stands for address of sample format range.
        ' This method assumes that both the column ranges passed as argument are similar in sense that
        ' 1. They have same number of areas.
        ' 2. The number of rows is also similar.
        ' With this assumption, the ranges are looped through simultaneously.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Column Range--The single column range That contains the names of boardwalk tables to format.
        ' * Column Range--That contains the formatting source.
        ' The source could be either a boardwalk table containing format criteria or a sample format range.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Public Sub FormatAllBWTablesWithAssociationRule()

        Public Sub FormatAllBWTablesWithAssociationRule()
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : FormatAllBWTablesWithAssociationRule
        ' Author : Siddhant Chothe
        ' Date : 7/12/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure formats all boardwalk tables as per the associated rule tables or sample ranges.
        ' The association is read from columns of cuboid association table defined in ScratchPadManager module.
        ' The rule type column must have "Format" as value.
        ' Main cuboid column must list out the boardwalk tables to format.
        ' The source column must have either
        ' "BoardwalkTable:"
        ' or "Range:"
        ' Where stands for format criteria cuboid.
        ' And stands for address of sample format range.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Public Sub FormatBWTableOnName(sBwtName As String)

        Public Sub FormatBWTableOnName(sBwtName As String)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : FormatBWTableOnName
        ' Author : Siddhant Chothe
        ' Date : 7/14/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure formats boardwalk table as per the associated rule tables or sample ranges.
        ' The method accepts name of the boardwalk table to format.
        ' The association is read from columns of cuboid association table defined in ScratchPadManager module.
        ' Then the formatting is done as indicated by corresponding source column value.
        ' To know about what should be the value in the source column for proper formatting, refer to the documentation of FormatAllBWTablesWithAssociationRule method
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Public Sub FormatBWTableOnRuleName(sRule As String)

        Public Sub FormatBWTableOnRuleName(sRule As String)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : FormatBWTableOnRuleName
        ' Author : Siddhant Chothe
        ' Date : 8/01/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure formats boardwalk table as per the associated rule tables or sample ranges.
        ' The method accepts rule name defining the association.
        ' The association is read from columns of cuboid association table defined in ScratchPadManager module.
        ' Then the formatting is done as indicated by corresponding source column value.
        ' To know about what should be the value in the source column for proper formatting, refer to the documentation of FormatAllBWTablesWithAssociationRule method
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Sub FormatBWTableUsingRule(bwt As BoardwalkTable, bwtFormatRules As BoardwalkTable)

        Private Sub FormatBWTableUsingRule(bwt As BoardwalkTable, bwtFormatRules As BoardwalkTable)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : FormatBWTableUsingRule
        ' Author : Nitin Dhaware
        ' Date : 3/17/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure formats the boardwalk table using the format rule boardwalk table.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Boardwalk table to format--The table that will be formatted.
        ' * Boardwalk table with format rule--The boardwalk table that contains the entire format rule to be used for formatting.
        ' To know how to create the format rule table, refer to the module documentation.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Public Sub FormatBWTableUsingSample(bwt As BoardwalkTable, rngSample As Range)

        Public Sub FormatBWTableUsingSample(bwt As BoardwalkTable, rngSample As Range)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : FormatBWTableUsingSample
        ' Author : Sandhya Murkute
        ' Date : 3/16/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure formats table with a sample format range.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Boardwalk table--The table that needs to be formatted
        ' * Sample range--From where the sample format is copied and applied to boardwalk table.
        '* 10-08-2013 11:04 Zero Row Cuboid scenario is fixed.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Public Sub FormatRangeUsingSample(bwt As Range, rngSample As Range)

        Public Sub FormatRangeUsingSample(bwt As Range, rngSample As Range)
        Details:

      • Private Function GetBWTableColumnRangeOnIndices(bwt As BoardwalkTable, sElem As String, vntColumnIndices As Variant) As Range

        Private Function GetBWTableColumnRangeOnIndices(bwt As BoardwalkTable, sElem As String, vntColumnIndices As Variant) As Range
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : GetBWTableColumnRangeOnIndices
        ' Author : Siddhant Chothe
        ' Date : 3/17/2011
        ' Purpose :
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Boardwalk table--From which the column range is to be retrieved.
        ' * Element type--Specified in "ELEMENT" column of format rule table.
        ' * Array of column indices--The array of Integer datatype containing indices mentioned in "BW_COLUMNS" column of format rule table.
        ' Returns: Range
        ' * Column range--The range of boardwalk columns that need to be formatted.
        ' Contains header range when element type is "Header" and just data range when element type is "Data".
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Function GetFilteredBwTableRange(bwt As BoardwalkTable, vntColHeaders As Variant, vntColVals As Variant) As Range

        Private Function GetFilteredBwTableRange(bwt As BoardwalkTable, vntColHeaders As Variant, vntColVals As Variant) As Range
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : GetFilteredBwTableRange
        ' Author : Nitin Dhaware
        ' Date : 3/15/2011
        ' Purpose : This function gets the filtered range given the list of columns to filter and values to filter by.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Array of headers--The array of boardwalk column headers.
        ' * Array of values--The array of corresponding values on which the boardwalk columns must be filtered.
        ' Returns: Range
        ' * Range--That contains the filtered rows.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Function GetRangeOnColumnCriteria(bwt As BoardwalkTable, sElem As String, sColumnCriteria As String) As Range

        Private Function GetRangeOnColumnCriteria(bwt As BoardwalkTable, sElem As String, sColumnCriteria As String) As Range
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : GetRangeOnColumnCriteria
        ' Author : Siddhant Chothe
        ' Date : 3/15/2011
        ' Purpose : This function accepts values from "ELEMENT" column and "BW_COLUMNS" columns from format rule table and returns the corresponding column range.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Boardwalk table--From which the column range must be picked out.
        ' * Element type--Specified in "ELEMENT" column of format rule table.
        ' * Column criteria--That need to be picked for formatting. Specified in "BW_COLUMNS" of format rule table.
        ' Returns: Range
        ' * Column range--The range of boardwalk columns that need to be formatted.
        ' Contains header range when element type is "Header" and just data range when element type is "Data".
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------
